line0.text: When the crossed swords pierced Fenrir's heart, the raging winds ceased, slowly abandoning the legions of cinders they carried.

line1.text: The sons of Muspell fell to their knees and the Gates of Helheim crumbled. A last wave rolled over the sea as Jörmungandr descended into the abyss.

line2.text: Then, the sun emerged from the darkness, turning Fenrir to dust. And a fresh breeze carried it all away.

line3.text: Everyone remained silent. Once again, we could hear the clear flow of the rivers.

line4.text: And finally, we said goodbye.

line5.text: Liv sailed back to Northgard, where she rebuilt our old kingdom with the help of Borgild. Many of the new clans joined them there.

line6.text: Svarn settled in the newly conquered land of Kernev with his spiritual kin, Nominoë.

line7.text: And I was invited by Gelon and Hildegard to share a new dominion with the Gayants, on the shores I had first set foot on.

line8.text: Under the rule of its new monarch, Neustria finally entered a lasting age of peace.

line9.text: Although the old empire had been partitioned, its peoples were now unified for the first time.

line10.text: Thus ended what had begun in betrayal and discord.

line11.text: The fates of these three kingdoms, entwined by the chaotic upsets of Ragnarök, would remain forever crossed.

BannerStag.name: Brand
BannerStag.desc: Proud and noble at heart, the bannerman of the Stag Clan is a loyal man who lives and fights with honor. Nothing matters more to him than his people's wellbeing. He is faithful to you, as his father was to yours, and is willing to help you exact your revenge... and conquer Northgard!

BannerRig.name: Rig
BannerRig.desc: Noble but disgraced, Rig is the fallen king of Northgard. After unifying the Norse clans to fuel his personal vengeance, he failed to ward off Ragnarök and watched his authority crumble. Now, he wants to regain his honor and rebuild his kingdom.

BannerGoat.name: Halvard
BannerGoat.desc: The elderly bannerman of the Goat Clan is a wise and kind-hearted man focused on the survival of his people. He abhors senseless violence, but still packs quite a punch when provoked. He and the Heidrun Clan pledged allegiance to you after you saved them from ravenous wolves.

BannerWolf.name: Egil
BannerWolf.desc: A ruthless and impetuous young berserker, the bannerman of the Wolf Clan is mostly in it for the mayhem. Brand had little trouble rallying him to your cause: a quest for vengeance and the prospect of glorious battle were enough to get him excited.

BannerRaven.name: Liv
BannerRaven.desc: Ambitious and pragmatic, the cunning bannermaiden of the Raven Clan likes to control every parameter of a situation and hates wasting time or Kröwns on futile pursuits. Seeing that the tide was turning, she didn't hesitate to kill Hagen, her mentor, to prove her loyalty to you.

BannerBoar.name: Svarn
BannerBoar.desc: The taciturn spiritual leader of the Boar Clan rebels is a sage and warrior who lives a simple life, close to nature and in accordance with the Old Ways. His uprising against Hvedrung was close to being crushed when you intervened. He is more than willing to help you, since you have a common nemesis.

BannerBear.name: Borgild
BannerBear.desc: Brave and arrogant, the bannermaiden of the Bear Clan is a tough woman who bows to no one and shows little mercy for the weakhearted. She refused to recognize you as the rightful king since you lost the Regal Horn, and so she challenged you to a contest, from which you emerged victorious. She had no choice but to grudgingly pledge her allegiance.

BannerLothaire.name: Lothaire
BannerLothaire.desc: Cunning and shrewd, Lothaire is the former king of Neustria. The poor reputation of this unjust lord made him vulnerable to his brother's betrayal, but his influence has not lessened and his ambitions remain unwavering.

BannerCarloman.name: Carloman
BannerCarloman.desc: Regal and authoritarian, Carloman became the new king of Neustria after overthrowing his own brother, Lothaire. But his lack of discernment has become a growing concern for his former allies.

BannerLion.name: Hildegard
BannerLion.desc: Pious and heroic, Hildegard emerged from the shadows after a vision of Ragnarök came to her. Determined to drive back this unholy menace, she also intends to unify Neustria and put an end to her brothers' incessant feuds.

BannerErmine.name: Nominoë
BannerErmine.desc: Strong-minded and popular, Nominoë leads the revolt of Kernev against Neustria. An adept of the region's semi-pagan spirituality, he's known as a selfless and down-to-earth leader.

CallBlood.name: Call of Blood
CallBlood.description: Other clans are thirsty for your blood. Survive and send them to Valhala.

InnerSea.name: Inner Sea
InnerSea.description: Get around the inner sea and defeat all your opponents one by one.

Cursed.name: The Cursed
Cursed.description: Valdemar summons new draugar from the dead. Team up with other clans to defeat his icy bodyguards and slay him.

VikingsGlory.name: Viking's Glory
VikingsGlory.description: Only the clans with the most fame will claim the rewards.

NewSettlers.name: New Settlers
NewSettlers.description: You'll have plenty of villagers; and all the problems that come with them.

LazyVillagers.name: Lazy Villagers
LazyVillagers.description: Villagers will not gather food. Try to assign them to buildings instead.

RaceYggdrasil.name: Race to Yggdrasil
RaceYggdrasil.description: To claim Yggdrasil, you must gather a lot of food. But don't forget that you have to store it.

SwampsDeath.name: Swamps of Death
SwampsDeath.description: You don't have much room for building. Choose wisely or expand more than usual.

Invasion.name: Invasion from Helheim
Invasion.description: You are alone to deal with the gates to Helheim. Expand and maintain the pressure before the end of times.

MarketSupplier.name: Master Supplier
MarketSupplier.description: [MarketPlace]s are cheap and efficient. Building a lot of them could be a good idea.

BeyondSea.name: Beyond the Sea
BeyondSea.description: Victory isn't on the mainland. Build docks and be the best merchant in the known world.

ImportedKnowledge.name: Imported Knowledge
ImportedKnowledge.description: Make money and purchase Knowledge with the power of currency.

WinterHere.name: Winter Is Here
WinterHere.description: Is it really possible to handle a terrible blizzard each winter? You will know the answer soon.

Oppressed.name: Defend The Oppressed
Oppressed.description: Destroy your enemies while defending your weaker ally.

Surrounded.name: Surrounded
Surrounded.description: What if all your enemies are around you? Don't let them expand too much!

SaveBifrost.name: Bifrost
SaveBifrost.description: Rush to colonize [BifrostLore] and protect it from other clans!

KeepSimple.name: Keep It simple
KeepSimple.description: No civilian building upgrade or tool improvement. You'll have to do a lot with very little.

WiseOne.name: The Wise One
WiseOne.description: Claim the [BigSword] and accumulate Lore to reach victory.

GreedPrice.name: Greed's Price
GreedPrice.description: Explore the land to find the resources you cannot produce.

Dystopia.name: Dystopia
Dystopia.description: Being always happy is good news. Deal with the [SpecterWarrior] to maintain your happiness.

HostileLands.name: Hostile Lands
HostileLands.description: Don't be too slow to expand. Skirmisher are powerful and can bring an easy victory.

Frozen.name: Frozen Gates
Frozen.description: Survive long enough and hope the frozen horde destroy your enemies. Between two frozen attacks, feel free to kill them yourself, if you can.

MuspellWrath.name: Muspell's Wrath
MuspellWrath.description: Kill more [GiantFire]s than your opponents. Take no breaks; your opponents are as bloodthirsty as you!

Wyverns.name: Too Many Wyverns
Wyverns.description: Wyverns, zombie wyverns, enormous wyvern, ... Let's go to town!

ValkyrieGalore.name: Valkyrie Galore
ValkyrieGalore.description: If you can't control Helheim enough, just don't let your enemies do it.

GemCutter.name: Gem Cutter
GemCutter.description: Selling gemstones is the best way to make money.

OdinsGlory.name: For Odin's Glory
OdinsGlory.description: Expand quickly to get to the many iron deposits before your enemies.

BefriendJotnar.name: Befriend the Jötnar
BefriendJotnar.description: Defend the [GiantFaction]s despite their aggressive tendencies, then befriend them.

KoboldInfestation.name: Kobold Infestation
KoboldInfestation.description: You must control many territories to win. But Kobolds will expand quickly...

MyrkalfarUprising.name: Myrkalfar Uprising
MyrkalfarUprising.description: Ragnarok is rough, Myrkalfar are aggressive, eruptions are frequent. Just basic survival will be a challenge.

DeathMatch.name: Death Match
DeathMatch.description: Every year a tournament confronts all warchiefs. Train and gain the power to be the last one standing.

NoGodNoMaster.name: No Gods or Masters
NoGodNoMaster.description: Knowledges must be learned with experience; no gods can help you this time.

NidavellirDoor.name: Threats from the Underground
NidavellirDoor.description: Survive the dwarves' assaults and destroy the [NidavellirGate].

Foxholes.name: Foxholes
Foxholes.description: You've arrived in [Fox]s' territory. Survive their attacks and eliminate the other clans.

HowToTrainYourWyvern.name: How to train your Wyvern
HowToTrainYourWyvern.description: Protect the abandoned [BabyWyvernDen] until the egg hatches.

TheGreatHunt.name: The Great Hunt
TheGreatHunt.description: Just you, the wild, and an unchained warg. Find it and kill it to prove your hunting skill.

GloriousLands.name: Glorious Lands
GloriousLands.description: This land has all the resources you need. All you have to do is expand and accumulate [Fame] faster than your opponents.

Minopoly.name: Minopoly
Minopoly.description: The [DwarfFaction]s have claimed ownership of the ores. So you better be on good terms with them if you want some.

RisingFromTheAbyss.name: Rising from the Abyss
RisingFromTheAbyss.description: [MarmennillFaction]s have surrounded the island and they want to bargain.

ZombieDraugr.desc: Every viking that dies has a chance to become a neutral [Death].

MoreDraugar.desc: [Death]s respawn quicker from [DeathCamp] and appear more frequently from portals.

NoWalls.desc: No natural walls, all zones are connected.

ForceBigSword.desc: [BigSword] is at the center of the land, already discovered.

ForceHelheim.desc: [Helheim] is at the center of the land, already discovered.

ForceVolcano.desc: [Volcano] is at the center of the land, already discovered.

ForceMagmaFlow.desc: [MagmaFlow] is at the center of the land, already discovered.

ManyLore.desc: There are more [CircleStone]s and [RuneStone]s than usual.

PillarOfGod.desc: You can find a few [PillarOfGod]s. You can assign [Scholar]s to them who will produce [Fame].

BoatResourceFame.desc: Each new year, the player with the highest [Fame] gains resources that will arrive by boat.

Eruptions.desc: Starting at year 802, volcanic eruptions happen each year.

AggressiveMyrkalfar.desc: There are many aggressive [MyrkalfarFaction] camps. Beware of their frequent and early attacks.

ManyKobolds.desc: There are many [KoboldHouse]s. [KoboldFaction]s are more aggressive, and they respawn and expand more quickly.

MoreValkyries.desc: There are [Valkyrie]s on many zones. They are more aggressive.

ManyFactions.desc: All neutral factions are present. There is less hostility in each zone.

WithGemstone.desc: You can find [GemstoneDeposit]s, that produce [Gemstone] which can be sold for a lot of [Money].

HappinessGemstone.desc: Gathering or trading [Gemstone] increases [Happy]. Failing to do so decreases [Happy].

StartCenter.desc: You start at the center of the land.

InnerSea.desc: The center of the land is full of water.

FrozenZombies.desc: Waves of frozen zombified foes come from [Niflheim]s to attack the clans each winter.

FrozenGate.desc: Many [Niflheim]s are opened in the land.

BifrostNoLore.desc: As soon as [BifrostLore] is colonized, the [Lore] you earn is used to activate it.

BasicUpgrade.desc: Can't upgrade buildings or forge tools.

SuperScout.desc: [Scout]s can scout enemy territory without an upgraded [ScoutCamp].

MushroomsHappy.desc: [Happy] is always at ::value::. Any [SpecterWarrior] will ruin your day.

Elevation.desc: A curse will regularly occur, turning some of your population into [SpecterWarrior].

DeathSwamp.desc: All zones have reduced available room for buildings.

MoreFoodSource.desc: There are more [Shoal], [Fertility] and [DeerSpawner] than usual.

Biggdrasil.desc: [Yggdrasil] is larger and costs more to colonize, but it takes only 1 month.

BetterCauldron.desc: The [RelicCauldron] relic costs no [Iron], takes half the time to forge and doesn't count as a built relic.

HeavyPrestige.desc: Incremental rewards for Commercial Influence happens more frequently.

SkirmisherRuthless.desc: [Skirmisher]s have [SkirmisherRuthless] ability, they are more effective versus animals and mystical creatures.

ManyTreasure.desc: There are more lost treasures than usual.

MuspellInvasion.desc: [Muspell]s are opened everywhere, pouring out [GiantFire]s regularly. No one can close them.

BlessJotnar.desc: A large [GiantCamp] has been spotted on this land.

HelheimInvasion.desc: Control and keep all [Helheim]s before time ends.

ManyWyverns.desc: Lots of [Wyvern]s are spotted. It's time for the hunt!

NoResourceLore.desc: There is no [Lore]. All buildings producing [Lore] are disabled. You can't gain [Lore].

PurchaseTechWithKrowns.desc: All Knowledge can be purchased with [Money]. Knowledge is more expensive.

IsWeakIA.desc: You must defend your weak ally against the other clans.

BloodMoonReinforcement.desc: You will receive military units before each new [BloodMoon].

LethalRuins.desc: Your [Scout]s die when they finish looting treasures.

MoreReqHappyFoodConsumption.desc: Your population needs more happiness and to eat more food.

WarchiefElimination.desc: After they died ::value:: times, the clan is eliminated.
WarchiefElimination.props.desc:
You earn [MilitaryXP] by killing enemy units or losing your own in battle only when your Warchief is in the fight.
Every ::threshold:: [MilitaryXP] your Warchief will gain +::att::% Attack power and +::def::% Defense.

WarchiefStart.desc: Every clan starts with their warchiefs.

NoMilitPaths.desc: There are no Military Paths. Instead, [MilitaryXP] gives warchiefs more attack power and defense.

NidavellirDoor.desc: The [NidavellirGate] opened in the middle of Northgard and is heavily protected.

AggressiveDwarf.desc: The closer to the [NidavellirGate] you get, the more the [DwarfFaction]s are hostiles.

SplitLore.desc: Different types of Knowledge are unlocked with different resources.

WargBoss.desc: A [Warg] is hiding somewhere and provokes frequent assaults of [SacredWolf]s.

MoreFame.desc: You gain more [Fame] from all sources.

MoreExploitation.desc: All zones contain more natural resources.

BabyWyvern.desc: Enemy clans and wild creatures will attack the [BabyWyvernDen]. You must defend it.

MarmennillDominion.desc: Multiple [MarmennillFaction]s have risen from the depth and they want to bargain.

BefriendDwarves.desc: There are many [DwarfFaction]s, and only they control the ores. Befriend them quickly if you want some.

DwarvenOreOnly.desc: [Stones]s and [IronDeposit]s will only spawn in Dwarf camps in great amount.

RichBeach.desc: Most resources are concentrated on the shores.

ThickGrass.desc: [Scout]s don't reveal units hiding in the [TallGrass].

BWarchief.desc: -::inv_percent:: cost and revive cooldown for your Warchief

BWarchiefVsUndead.desc: Your warchief has +::percent:: attack power against [Valkyrie]s and [Death]s

BFreeWeapon.desc: {Unit}s weapon costs no resources and forge time is divided by ::value::.

BSilo.desc: [FoodSilo]s store +::percent:: and bonus is increased by ::percent1::

BFreeTool.desc: {Unit}s tools costs no resources and forge time is divided by ::value::.

BMoreSheeps.desc: Each year, you gain ::value:: [Sheep]s for every ::value1:: you own

BForgeRelics.desc: Relics forge time and price is reduced by ::inv_percent::

BSiloImproved.desc: [FoodSilo]s are free, use no building slot and improve [Food] gathering from [Villager]s

BBarricades.desc: You start with the [Defense] Knowledge. +::percent:: on [Defense] bonuses.

BFoodAnimals.desc: [Meat] provided by animals such as [Wolf]s, [Bear]s and Lynxes is increased by ::percent::

BBerserkerBetter.desc: Your [Berserker] gains +::percent:: attack power and defense and his recruitment cost is reduced by ::inv_percent1::

BMilitaryHappy.desc: [Happy] provided by your military units is increased by ::percent::

BHomeland.desc: You receive ::value:: [Villager]s, ::value:: max population and ::value1::[Happy] every ::value2:: [Prestige].

BKaija.desc: Start with [BearMaiden], bonus of +::percent:: attack power and defense.

BMender.desc: +::percent:: for [Mender]s production. [Mender]s tool costs no resources and forge time is divided by 2.

BAltar.desc: [Temple] costs ::percent:: and gains +::percent1:: to all bonuses

BBuildingUpgrade.desc: When you upgrade your [Townhall], you gain ::value:: free building upgrades

BSigny.desc: [WarchiefSnake] gets +::percent:: attack power and defense, and +::health1:: health

BScorchedEarth.desc: The limit of simultaneous [ScorchedEarth] zone is multiplied by ::value::.

BWarchiefRegen.desc: Your warchiefs regenerate in your territory.

BWarchiefProd.desc: +::percent:: bonus production in zones with a warchief

BGreatTower.desc: Whenever a [BFTower] is destroyed, it kills all units in the zone

BSpectralWarrior.desc: [NornArmor] are ::percent:: cheaper to recruit, and their [Purify] ability has no cooldown.

BCoastalHurt.desc: Enemy units in your coastal territory lose life over time

BRecycling.desc: Destroying your buildings earns you back their building cost. Likewise destroying enemy ones using [Dash].

BOxShadow.desc: [OxHero] can summon his own shadow to follow him everywhere.

BHomeDeer.desc:
You start with [Deer]s on your starting zone.
[Hunter] produce ::percent:: more [Meat].

BArchery.desc: Your [Archery] give +::value:: [Warband] (+::value1:: if upgraded) and [Tracker]s are ::value2:: [Money] cheaper.

BWilderHunt.desc: [WildHunt] calls the last ::value:: waves of mythical animals killed.

BMultipleMeal.desc:
You produce ::percent:: more [Ingredient]s.
You can benefit from multiple meals at the same time.

BDeathDisease.desc: When killed, your units inflict Sickness on their attacker.

BOverwork.desc: Wounded units do not suffer production malus when Overworking.

BMoreHousing.desc: Non-mystic buildings can house ::value:: more villagers.

BOffensiveCivilian.desc: Your civilians can go into neutral territory.

BFarColonize.desc: The clan can colonize zones non-adjacent to its territory.

BGlacialWinds.desc: [EagleHero] can summon [GlacialWinds] on a zone. Freezing all enemy units in the zone for 30 seconds.

BMilitaryChurch.desc: [Church]s count as military camps and [Paladin]s can receive a military upgrade.

BUnlimitedRelics.desc: The clan is no longer limited to a single Relic.

BPyreHealing.desc: When the [Purification] is ignited, all your units heal.

BCheaperArrows.desc: Reduces arrows' [Wood] consumption in combat by ::percent::.

BWarLures.desc: Allied military units receive +::percent:: attack power and +::percent:: defense as long as they are in a zone containing a [Trap] or a [LureSacred].

Christmas.texts.name: Permafrost
Christmas.texts.themeDesc: The land of Northgard is now covered with eternal snow. Survive the neverending winter and battle your enemies while the ocean slowly freezes and becomes non-navigable under the polar winds.

Ragnarok.texts.name: Ragnarok
Ragnarok.texts.themeDesc: A gigantic volcano emerged at the center of Northgard. Withstand the apocalyptic era of Ragnarok and battle your enemies while enduring relentless eruptions.

Halloween.texts.name: Draugrheim
Halloween.texts.themeDesc: Everything is spookier now. Your scarecrow won't suffice to keep the nasty spiders away!

France.texts.name: Neustria
France.texts.themeDesc: Everything seems different on this southern land, and you won't find any of the old Norse monuments here.

Christmas.name: Christmas
Christmas.news.title: Winter Festival
Christmas.news.desc: Check out the new Permafrost map and the festival decorations!

Halloween.name: Halloween
Halloween.news.title: Halloween
Halloween.news.desc: Check out the new Draugrheim map!

ArtbookNews.name: Artbook
ArtbookNews.news.title: The Art of Northgard - Official Artbook
ArtbookNews.news.link.name: Pre-order

IOSNews.news.title: Northgard is now available on iOS!
IOSNews.news.desc: Draw your axe, your shield and your iPhone and conquer these harsh lands on the go now!
IOSNews.news.link.name: Discover now

Wartales.news.title: Try our latest game, Wartales!
Wartales.news.desc: The demo for our newest game, Wartales is available now on Steam, click here to check it out!
Wartales.news.link.name: Play now

WartalesAlpha.name: Wartales Alpha
WartalesAlpha.news.title: Wartales is OUT NOW!
WartalesAlpha.news.desc: Step into Wartales, a challenging and gigantic Open World RPG!
WartalesAlpha.news.link.name: Check it now!

PatchBalancing.name: Patch Balancing
PatchBalancing.news.title: Balancing Patch 7 - July 2021
PatchBalancing.news.desc: Check out our last balancing patch !
PatchBalancing.news.link.name: Patch Notes

KrownsAndDagger.name: Kröwns And Daggers
KrownsAndDagger.news.title: Kröwns And Daggers
KrownsAndDagger.news.desc: We are very happy to finally present to you the sixth major free update to Northgard, Kröwns and Daggers!
KrownsAndDagger.news.link.name: Patch Notes

News.name: Try the new Shiro Unlimited game for free!
News.news.title: Try the new Shiro Unlimited game for free!
News.news.desc: Try the demo of Decarnation until October 10 and check out our Stream with the developers.
News.news.link.name: Link

CrossVidarFinal.name: Cross of Vidar
CrossVidarFinal.news.title: Cross of Vidar
CrossVidarFinal.news.desc:
Available now
“The Cross of Vidar”, a new major expansion is available now for Northgard!
This expansion brings a new campaign taking place after the events of the first, updated systems and fresh gameplay mechanics with the introduction of a new faction: the Kingdom of Neustria.

Survey.name: Survey
Survey.news.title: Annual Community Survey
Survey.news.desc: Take part in the satisfaction survey to help us in our efforts to improve the player experience in Northgard.
Survey.news.link.name: Take part

Weekly1.name: Week-long Journey
Weekly1.desc: Achieve side goals during your battles that range from menial tasks to the most arduos endeavours, and reap the rewards to unlock Treasures!

line0.name: Common errand
line0.desc: A short task, easily completed by anyone of goodwill.

line1.name: Standard commission
line1.desc: A simple task that still requires some effort.

line2.name: Major labour
line2.desc: An important job that requires dedication and rigor to be completed.

line3.name: Crucial mission
line3.desc: A backbreaking venture that only the best prepared and most committed crews will achieve.

Daily1.name: Daily Trip
Daily1.desc: Take advantage of those short side goals changing every day to get some [Silver]s and unlock Treasures!

line0.name: Troops training
line0.desc: Keep your people and your troops alert by winning one game of any kind with any clan.

line1.name: War effort
line1.desc: Help sustain the war effort by completing a simple task.

line0.name: Participate to Halloween
line0.desc: Play a game in Draugrheim.

CampaignChapters.name: Rig's Saga
CampaignChapters.desc: Follow the storyline of Rig's Saga on any difficulty.

CampaignObjectives.name: The Secrets of Rig's Saga
CampaignObjectives.desc: Complete the secret objectives of Rig's Saga on any difficulty.

CompleteCampaign.name: Rig's Legacy
CompleteCampaign.desc: Leave your mark in history by achieving victory in higher difficulty settings!

Campaign2Chapters.name: Cross of Vidar
Campaign2Chapters.desc: Follow the storyline of Cross of Vidar on any difficulty.

Campaign2Objectives.name: The Secrets of Cross of Vidar
Campaign2Objectives.desc: Complete the secret objectives of Cross of Vidar on any difficulty.

CompleteCampaign2.name: Vidar's Legacy
CompleteCampaign2.desc: Lay the foundations of a new world by overcoming Ragnarök in higher difficulty settings!

line0.name: Perfectionist
line0.desc: Finish all battles of a Conquest

line1.name: Domination
line1.desc: Finish at least 6 Conquests with different clans

line2.name: I came, I saw, I conquered.
line2.desc: Win each of the 30 different battles

line3.name: Emperor
line3.desc: Finish a Conquest in Hard difficulty

line4.name: Sovereign
line4.desc: Finish a Conquest in Extreme difficulty

Exploration.name: Exploration
Exploration.desc: Expeditions centered around unveiling specific zones using [Scout]s.

FactionFriend.name: Wildlife & Creeps
FactionFriend.desc: Expeditions related to the wildlife, factionless foes or neutrals.

Colonization.name: Expansion
Colonization.desc: Expeditions mostly centered around colonizing and exploiting

Buildings.name: Buildings & Structures
Buildings.desc: Expeditions related to buildings and other structures.

Economy.name: Economy
Economy.desc: Expeditions centered around economic efforts and resource gathering.

MilitaryPath.name: Warfare
MilitaryPath.desc: Expeditions centered around warfare and Military Paths.

GeneralVictories.name: Victory Types
GeneralVictories.desc: Expeditions related to the different types of victory in the game.

OldRanks.name: Victory Count
OldRanks.desc: All your victories, regardless of their type and clan used.

Ragnarok.name: Ragnarök
Ragnarok.desc: Expeditions unique to the "Ragnarök" game mode.

AVictoryMilitary.name: Warlord
AVictoryMilitary.desc: Achieve a Domination Victory [not in Story Mode]

AVictoryMoney.name: Great Merchant
AVictoryMoney.desc: Achieve a Trade Victory [not in Story Mode]

AVictoryFame.name: King of Northgard
AVictoryFame.desc: Achieve a Fame Victory [not in Story Mode]

AVictoryLore.name: The Wise
AVictoryLore.desc: Achieve a Wisdom Victory [not in Story Mode]

AVictoryHelheim.name: The Protector
AVictoryHelheim.desc: Win by guarding the Gate of Helheim [not in Story Mode]

AVictoryYggdrasil.name: The Mystic
AVictoryYggdrasil.desc: Win by taking control of Yggdrasil [not in Story Mode]

AVictoryOdinSword.name: The Smith
AVictoryOdinSword.desc: Win by forging the Sword of Odin [not in Story Mode]

ARank1.name: Warrior Rank
ARank1.desc: Achieve 10 victories with any clan [not in Story Mode]

ARank2.name: Warchief Rank
ARank2.desc: Achieve 25 victories with any clan [not in Story Mode]

ARank3.name: Thane Rank
ARank3.desc: Achieve 50 victories with any clan [not in Story Mode]

ARank4.name: Jarl Rank
ARank4.desc: Achieve 100 victories with any clan [not in Story Mode]

ARank5.name: King Rank
ARank5.desc: Achieve 250 victories with any clan [not in Story Mode]

ARank6.name: High King Rank
ARank6.desc: Achieve 500 victories with any clan [not in Story Mode]

ARank7.name: Norse God
ARank7.desc: Achieve 1000 victories with any clan [not in Story Mode]

AWolfVictory.name: Aggressor
AWolfVictory.desc: Win with the clan of the Wolf [not in Story Mode]

AStagVictory.name: Proud
AStagVictory.desc: Win with the clan of the Stag [not in Story Mode]

AGoatVictory.name: Survivor
AGoatVictory.desc: Win with the clan of the Goat [not in Story Mode]

ARavenVictory.name: Merchant
ARavenVictory.desc: Win with the clan of the Raven [not in Story Mode]

ABearVictory.name: Stalwart
ABearVictory.desc: Win with the clan of the Bear [not in Story Mode]

ABoarVictory.name: Recluse
ABoarVictory.desc: Win with the Clan of the Boar [not in Story Mode]

ASnakeVictory.name: Devious
ASnakeVictory.desc: Win with the Clan of the Snake

ADragonVictory.name: Blood Taste
ADragonVictory.desc: Win with the Clan of the Dragon

AHorseVictory.name: Builder
AHorseVictory.desc: Win with the Clan of the Horse

AKrakenVictory.name: Day of the Tentacle
AKrakenVictory.desc: Win with the Clan of the Kraken

AOxVictory.name: Unstoppable Force
AOxVictory.desc: Win with the Clan of the Ox

ALynxVictory.name: The cat's out of the bag
ALynxVictory.desc: Win with the Clan of the Lynx

ASquirrelVictory.name: Aggressive Negotiations
ASquirrelVictory.desc: Win with the Clan of the Squirrel

ARatVictory.name: The Rat King
ARatVictory.desc: Win with the Clan of the Rat

ACompleteBattles.name: I came, I saw, I conquered.
ACompleteBattles.desc: Win each of the 30 different battles

Wounded.name: Wounded
Wounded.desc: Wounded clan members have ::inv_percent:: reduced production.

NotHappy.name: Unhappy
NotHappy.desc: Unhappy clan members have ::inv_percent:: reduced production.

Overcrowded.name: Overcrowded
Overcrowded.desc: A zone with too many workers no longer provides sufficient [Comfort] and suffers a ::inv_percent:: production malus.

Sick.name: Sick
Sick.desc: Sick clan members regain ::inv_percent:: less health from healing.

WinterMalus.name: Harsh conditions
WinterMalus.desc: Your military units have ::inv_percent:: reduced power during winter outside your territory and 10% inside your territory.

FarFromHome.name: Supply Penalty
FarFromHome.desc: Your military units have up to ::inv_percent:: reduced attack power and defense depending on their distance from your territory.

UseStock.name: Using Stock
UseStock.desc: During winter, you are consuming ::percent:: more resources than any other clan.

Overwork.name: Overworking
Overwork.desc: Your units produce ::percent:: faster, but lose life over time.

SlaveFood.name: Slave idle
SlaveFood.desc: You have some [Slave]s not assigned to a building.

CanCook.desc: A meal is waiting to be cooked.

BreedingIncoming.desc: We have noticed that one of your sheep is expecting a baby.

HighTide.name: High Tide
HighTide.desc: Kraken building and attack penalties no longer affect this zone.

Occupied.name: Occupy
Occupied.desc: You occupy this zone. You benefit from its bonus and can scout its [Ruins] or [BrokenShores].

Stilted.name: Shallow Waters
Stilted.desc: This zone can sustain an additional building. Can be cumulated with Zone Development.

TrapStake.name: Spike Trap
TrapStake.desc: Units will take damage and slow down as long as they stay within.

UnitAtRisk.name: Exhausted
UnitAtRisk.desc: Exhausted clan members might die during overwork.

HoldTheLine.name: Hold The Line
HoldTheLine.desc: Unit will be slowed in this zone

GlacialWinds.name: Glacial Winds
GlacialWinds.desc: Unit will be slowed in this zone

WMilitaryPath.name: Military Paths
WMilitaryPath.desc: Accumulate military experience through combat and war, and decide what is your path.

WResourcesInfos.name: Resources Infos
WResourcesInfos.desc: Explanation of all the resources and the detail of their flux.

WMilitaryGroup.name: Military Group Assignations
WMilitaryGroup.desc: All your troops are always accessible with the main military group. Additionnaly, you can assign part of your troops to sub groups

WVictory.name: Victory Conditions
WVictory.desc: You can win by Domination, Fame, Trade, Lore and a Special Condition, choose your path to glory.

WUnitStatus.name: Status Icons
WUnitStatus.desc: Explanation of the units, zones or building icons.

WManageUnits.name: Manage Units
WManageUnits.desc: All your population sorted by jobs.

WVoiceChatOptions.name: Mute Options
WVoiceChatOptions.desc: Choose a player to Mute/Unmute voice chat

AddUnit.name: Add / remove units from selection
AddUnit.desc: Pressing this when selecting units in any way will make them join or leave the selected group

SplitUnit.name: Single Unit Order
SplitUnit.desc: Only one unit from the selection group will respond to your order

Ability1.name: Use first ability
Ability1.desc: Use the first ability of the selection

Ability2.name: Use second ability
Ability2.desc: Use the second ability of the selection

Ability3.name: Use third ability
Ability3.desc: Use the third ability of the selection

Ability4.name: Use fourth ability
Ability4.desc: Use the fourth ability of the selection

ControlGroup1.name: Select control group 1
ControlGroup1.desc: Select all the units or building that are parts of the control group.

CreateControlGroup1.name: Create control group 1
CreateControlGroup1.desc: Create a control group with all the selected units or building.

CycleLookUp1.name: Cycle through objects 1
CycleLookUp1.desc: Cycle through all the units or buildings of the same type amongst the zones visible to you. If a lookup by owner was created, it will cycle only through units or buildings of the same player.

CreateLookUp1.name: Create lookup 1
CreateLookUp1.desc: Create a lookup using the type of the selected unit or building.

CreateOwnedLookUp1.name: Create lookup by owner 1
CreateOwnedLookUp1.desc: Create a lookup using the type of the selected unit or building owned by its player.
